title: Ground News - Gift of new blessing box Is model of church
text:
Summary by Star Beacon PLYMOUTH — Plymouth Methodist Church was recently gifted with a new blessing box that closely resembles the white church with a steeple. Township resident John Turner made the box with some help from his wife, Sandy, and church member Denise… Share menu More
